caption: Relating to the enrollment, including resident status and tuition rates, of certain persons, including persons not authorized to be present in the United States, in public institutions of higher education.
summary: This bill modifies Texas education code regarding resident status determination for tuition purposes. It removes provisions allowing undocumented students to qualify for in-state tuition. The bill requires institutions to report unauthorized immigrants to law enforcement. Chinese students and other international students with valid visas are not directly impacted, but those without proper authorization to be in the US will be charged non-resident tuition rates.
translation: 该法案修改了德克萨斯州教育法典中关于学费居民身份认定的规定。法案取消了允许无证学生获得州内学费待遇的条款。该法案要求教育机构向执法部门报告未经授权的移民。持有有效签证的中国留学生和其他国际学生不会直接受到影响，但那些在美国没有合法居留许可的人将被收取非居民学费。
